long_description: Ready to take a stand-up tour and see what's around the point? With the Werner Advantage paddle in hand, your stand up paddleboard responds quickly to every stroke. Lightweight fiberglass shaft offers light flex on every stroke and feels warm in the hands. Fiberglass-laminate blade provides lightweight power; teardrop shape with rounded corners reduces torque to smooth out each stroke. Slight spoon shape at the tip of the blade increases power of your stroke in the water; 7deg angle offers optimal efficiency from a standing position. Durable T-shaped ABS palm grip fits naturally in your hand, offering you refined control for a variety of paddle strokes.
short_description: Ready to take a stand-up tour and see what's around the point? With the Werner Advantage paddle in hand, your stand up paddleboard responds quickly to every stroke.
